Description:
Detect the use of "sc.exe" to change the startup type of a service to "disabled" or "demand"

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Service StartupType Change Via Sc.EXE
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (((command like '% config %' and command like '%start%') and (command like '%disabled%' or command like '%demand%')) and (process_path like '%\sc.exe' and original_file_name = 'sc.exe'))
